#summary &atilde character entity
#labels about-html,from-w3c
#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesA

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesA A] > &atilde

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Atilde;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00c3/index.htm U+000C3].
  * `&Atilde` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00c3/index.htm U+000C3].
  * `&atilde;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00e3/index.htm U+000E3].
  * `&atilde` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00e3/index.htm U+000E3].
